questions.qBody: What time is it? Can anybody tell me?
questions.key: Can anybody tell me what time it is?

questions.qBody: Where can I get my blood pressure checked?
questions.key: Could you tell me where I can get my blood pressure checked?

questions.qBody: What have we achieved in the past few months?
questions.key: Let's take a look at what we have achieved in the past few months.

questions.qBody: How difficult is the challenge? I can't imagine.
questions.key: I can't imagine how difficult the challenge is.

questions.qBody: When is the committee going to issue a formal statement?
questions.key: It is still unclear when the committee is going to issue a formal statement.

questions.qBody: Was a third person involved in the incident? The police are still investigating.
questions.key: The police are still investigating whether a third person was involved in the incident.
